content: the needle step 3 go into the first st on the back needle as if to purl pull the st off of the needle step 4 go into the second st on the back needle as if to knit leave the st on the needle now you have 4 new sts to work with repeat steps 1 - 4 until all sts are woven anchor on inside weave in ends make a second sock counting row to make sure it is the same length ©2018 plymouth yarn company 100418jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side yo = yarn over k2tog = knit 2 sts together skp = slip 1 as if to knit slip a second st as if to purl knit them together in that position
